Comment.value:
How to Use: During race selection select your base race, then click the subrace box and type in EXACTLY the name as it is in the syntax prompt below.

Subraces - Half-Orc


Ape

Syntax: Ape

Stats: 
+2 Strength, +4 Dexterity, +2 Constitution, -2 Wisdom, -2 Charisma

Feats: 
Dodge, Mobility, Ambidexterity.

Immunities: 
10% Bludgeoning

Misc Immunities: 
Freedom



Minotaur

Syntax: Minotaur

Stats: 
+2 Strength, -2 Dexterity, +4 Constitution, -2 Charisma

Feats: 
knockdown, darkvision, bullheaded

Special Ability: 
Stampede: Once per day Great Thunderclap with a bonus "trample damage" of 1d12 per 2 character levels of bludgeoning damage. bull's strength (as blackguard feat which allows one cast per day)



Ogre

Syntax: Ogre

Stats: 
+4 Strength, -2 Dexterity, +4 Constitution, -2 Charisma

Feats: 
Knockdown, Thug, Cleave, Exotic Weapon Proficiency.

Immunities: 
5% Slashing



Wemic

Syntax: Wemic

Stats: 
+2 Strength, +4 Dexterity, +4 Constitution, -2 Intelligence, -2 Wisdom, -2 Charisma

Skills: 
+20 Spot , +20 Listen

Feats: 
Knockdown, Darkvision, Freedom.

Special Ability: 
King of the Jungle: Once per day Wemics may cast a special Warcry. All original spell effects are retained with a bonus of 1d6 Sonic and 1d6 Divine damage done to all enemies in a 10 meter radius. Duration: 1 round per character level.
